title: Kapowsin Meats Inc. Recalls Pork Products Due To Possible Salmonella Contamination
summary: WASHINGTON, July 21, 2016 Kapowsin Meats Inc., a Graham, Wash. establishment, is recalling approximately 11,658 pounds of pork products that may be contaminated with Salmonella I 4,[5],12:i:-, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today.The whole roaster hogs were produced...
